en: Special effects volume. Clicks, explosions, etc.
Automatically move camera to current player HQ at the beginning of their turn.
Default camera style when a map is loaded.
Fast anti-aliasing method. Can look blurry.
Input frequency. Higher value makes controls smoother, but consumes more CPU.
Make the game fullscreen. Only applicable on devices that allow windowed mode.
Show decorative elements, like grass, flowers, etc.
Enable shadows on decorative elements. Dependant on global shadow settings.
Show notification when AP is completely depleted.
Box of tools that allows soldiers to fix all sorts of vehicles. Restores 5HP.
Replenishes all MP of the unit, and allows for one more attack.
Take an Infantry unit on board for transport.
Long-range guided missile that can hit both ground and air targets. Deals 10 damage.
Pack of medical supplies to heal soldiers. Restores 5HP.
Special shell that can hit a target up to 2 tiles away. Only shoots in a straight line. Deals 10 damage.
Shoulder-launched projectile with explosive warhead. Deals 8 damage.
Long-range guided missile that can hit both ground and air targets. Extended range. Deals 11 damage.
Deploy the Infantry unit, that is on board.
Gained mastery in special weapons thanks to years of training. All cooldowns are reduced by 1, but can not be less than 1.
Veteran of many campaigns. Learned how to efficiently bring fresh recruits to the battlefield. All Infantry-type units cost 10AP less.
Expert in communication in logistics. Thanks to better optimisation of equipment, all Towers provide 5AP more per turn.
A great leader, that spends time with his soldiers, to share his experience. All Infantry-type units start at Level 1.
Harsh and strong personality, that extends to the commanded soldiers. When claiming a building, Infantry looses all AP to intimidate crew instead of being consumed to replace it.
An inspiring leader, that is an example to all soldiers. All Infantry-type units have their armour and attack increased by 1.
Years of engineering experience allow for better Factory management. All Factory vehicles cost 10AP less to produce.
Years of military experience allow for better Airfield management. All Airfield craft cost 10AP less to produce.

Temporary attachment, that helps to better track fast-moving targets. Allows all neighbouring units to hit flying targets. If they already can hit them, increases damage by 1 instead. Does not affect Rocket Artillery.
Resupply all neighbouring units with spare parts and medical supplies. Restores 5HP.
Promote a unit, instantly granting it +1 level.
Call in an aerial precision strike. Deals 5 damage to the target tile, and to all it's neighbours. Can hit own units.
Inspire your unit up to 2 tiles away. Restores all MP and allows it to attack again, and use it's ability again.
Infiltrate enemy territory by instantly jumping to a tile, up to 2 tiles away.
Temporarily harden the armour of units up to 2 tiles away by 1 point.
Call in a paratrooper drop, up to 2 tiles away. Provides a free Infantry unit.
Before you can start using online options, your device needs to be registered with the online system. Registration only takes few seconds and is fully anonymous.

Requesting Player ID successful. Welcome to ToF Online!

Upload failed. Please try again later.
Could not download the map. Please check if code is correct and try again.
Show list of controls on screen.
Move camera when cursor is near the screen edge.
Online server domain name or IP address.
Online multiplayer relay server domain name or IP address.
Online multiplayer relay server port number.
How fast does the end turn progress bar fills.
You've made no moves. Are you sure?
Skip initial camera pan to HQ
Scale up UI on high resolution screens.
